message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "PSU and industrials outperformed this week (HINDCOPPER, BEL, HUDCO, NBCC, GRSE, HAL) while BFSI mid-caps (LTF, ABCAPITAL) showed strong momentum. IT was volatile (KPIT rebound), and autos like ASHOKLEY softened into week-end. Our portfolio gained ~2.0% W/W, driven by HINDCOPPER strength. Plan: book some profit in HINDCOPPER to diversify into momentum names (LTF, BEL) while retaining ASHOKLEY with a close watch on support near ₹138.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "sell",
      "symbol": "HINDCOPPER",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 3384.00,
      "reason": "Partial profit-booking after a 6%+ weekly rise to diversify risk; retain core position for the copper uptrend."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "shares": 15,
      "amount": 3934.95,
      "reason": "Strong, liquid uptrend all week (higher highs/higher closes, rising volume). Adds BFSI exposure and momentum."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "shares": 8,
      "amount": 3301.20,
      "reason": "Defence PSU momentum with consistent higher closes; broad PSU strength theme. Good liquidity and risk-adjusted trend."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 287.85,
    "total_value": 25769.30,
    "holdings_count": 4,
    "holdings": [
      "ASHOKLEY: 70 units",
      "HINDCOPPER: 25 units",
      "LTF: 15 units",
      "BEL: 8 units"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+2.0%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove PAGEIND: price too high for a ₹25k portfolio; impractical position sizing",
    "Remove ABBOTINDIA: very high price and low liquidity relative to portfolio size",
    "Remove ZFCVINDIA: very high price; unsuitable sizing for small portfolio",
    "Remove LMW: very high price and thin volumes; poor fit for sizing/risk",
    "Remove GILLETTE: high price and relatively low liquidity",
    "Remove DIXON: very high price per share; limits diversification",
    "Remove AIIL: high price and lower liquidity; not optimal for current capital"
  ]
}
